GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-04N 006-59E AT 220340Z NOV.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF
   THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOGC, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG AND TO
   IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 290602Z NOV 17.
